utils

Class Debug

  • java.lang.Object
    • utils.Debug

  • public class Debug
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to help in debugging of the code. Depending on the debug level, set for each class wishing to be debugged separately, the system may execute extra code to help with debugging (printing more information, or execute more sanity checks etc.) The code is normally used with constants bit information found in Constants class. Only up to 64 bits (the length of a long) can be monitored for debugging. The class is thread-safe (re-entrant)

    Title: popt4jlib

    Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2011

    Company:

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ioannis T. Christou

      • setDebugBit

        public static void setDebugBit(long bit)
        set the particular debug bits described in the argument. However, if the input argument is zero, RESET ALL debug bits to zero.
        Parameters:
        bit - long

      • toggle

        public static void toggle()
        alternate between "saving the debug bits and reseting" and "resuming debug bits".

      • saveDebugBits

        private static void saveDebugBits()
        save the current debug bits. Previous saved bits are overwritten.
